name: functions
description: Cloud Functions for seeCode.run: add, copy and authenticate pastebins

scripts.serve: cross-env NODE_ENV=development & firebase use development & firebase serve --only functions
scripts.serve-prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production & firebase use production & firebase serve --only functions
scripts.deploy: cross-env NODE_ENV=production & firebase use production & firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development & firebase use development & firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.logs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production & firebase use production & firebase functions:log
scripts.logs-dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development & firebase use development & firebase functions:log
